author: Ted Byrne
content: And here is your second collection (I am reading backwards today) just as you need to collect your bicycles... you also need a vehicular collection. You find parts of these things and anthropomorphize them. Now that you've pictured enough trees it is time to see the forrest. What your tiny scavengings add up to when they are brought together. No one better finds the lives who breathed themselves into these metal sheets. Show us what's emerging...
